::Grounded::
He looked back to see Wildrider start charging toward
Windlord.."Windlord" he called out..."Fly this way he will follow you
cuz he is in rampage...stay about 30 feet in air and fly directly over
me..."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> "Of course Im scared, h ah ah ha ha ha ha" Wildrider finished as he
started
> to kackle madly, being hit by bullets from Winlord, "Out, thats it your
> going down". He flew straight at Winlord, putting caution at the wind.
